scripts.build:am: node scripts/build-resources.mjs am && vite build && neu build --release --embed-resources
scripts.build:fw: node scripts/build-resources.mjs fw && vite build && neu build --release --embed-resources
scripts.release:am: npm run prepare:am && npm run build:am
scripts.release:fw: npm run prepare:fw && npm run build:fw
scripts.dev: vite build && neu build && neu run
